title: Connection fails once every game
body: Since one week ago every time once during a match I lose connection for like 40 seconds and I reconnect back everything freezes and gives me the trying to reconnect message in game. I don't know why this is happening and is really annoying because it happens randomly and only ONCE, I wish you guys could help me thanks. I don't have lag.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
These freezes and disconnections are very commonly associated with an *unstable connection* to our servers. This could be for a few different reasons, however, this is mostly caused by network settings that conflict with League. Working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) should assist in resolving this.

Let me know if this resolved the issue.
